sentences: Meie peres jõuluvana käib igal aastal.
context: Jõuluvana is the Estonian equivalent of Santa Claus or Father Christmas. It's a compound word made up of 'jõulud' (Christmas) and 'vana' (old man). The term refers to the figure who brings gifts to children on Christmas Eve. In Estonian tradition, this character has white hair and beard and delivers presents during the Christmas celebration.
